sense.def:
Kadar duhovnik
blesses people or things
, prosi Boga za milost in zaščito tistih ljudi ali stvari.

Človek, ki je
blessed with a particular good quality or skill
, ima določeno dobro lastnost ali spretnost.

seg.quote: She is blessed with immense talent and boundless energy.

sense.def:
Kadar nekomu rečemo
God bless
ali
bless you
, mu izrazimo svojo naklonjenost, hvaležnost ali dobre želje.

seg.quote: Bless you, it's terribly good of you to come.

sense.def:
Bless you
lahko rečemo človeku, ki je pravkar kihnil.
